control.description-key: Allows uploading files to a related table that has a file field

property.name: fileFieldLogicalName
property.description-key: Logical name of the file column on the child entity

property.name: fileSizeFieldLogicalName
property.description-key: Logical name of the text column storing file size in bytes

property.name: fileNameFieldLogicalName
property.description-key: Logical name of the text column storing the file name

property.name: maxFiles
property.description-key: Maximum number of files selectable per upload

property.name: maxUploadSizeMB
property.description-key: Maximum single file size in MB
